Generated Narrative: ConceptMap hospitalStay2FHIR-eu-hdr

Mapping from (not specified) to (not specified)


Group 1 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to Composition (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary (A.2.7.1 - Diagnostic summary)is equivalent toComposition.section:sectionDiagnosticSummaryDetails in the Composition.section:sectionDiagnosticSummary.entry of type Condition. See dedicated group
HospitalStay.significantProcedures (A.2.7.2 - Significant procedures)is equivalent toComposition.section:sectionSignificantProceduresDetails in the Composition.section:sectionSignificantProcedures.entry of type Procedure. See dedicated group
HospitalStay.medicalDevices (A.2.7.3 - Medical devices and implants)is equivalent toComposition.section:sectionMedicalDevicesDetails in the Composition.section:sectionMedicalDevices.entry of type DeviceUseStatement. See dedicated groups
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy (A.2.7.5 - Pharmacotherapy)is related toComposition.section:sectionMedicationsDetails in the Composition.section:sectionMedications.entry. See dedicated groups
HospitalStay.significantResults (A.2.7.6 - Significant Observation Results)is related toComposition.section:sectionSignificantResults
HospitalStay.significantResults.details (A.2.7.6.4 - Observation details)is related toComposition.section:sectionSignificantResults.text
HospitalStay.synthesis (A.2.7.7 - Synthesis)is related toComposition.section:sectionSynthesis
HospitalStay.synthesis.description (A.2.7.7.1 - Problem synthesis)is related toComposition.section:sectionSynthesis.text
HospitalStay.synthesis.reasoning (A.2.7.7.2 - Clinical reasoning)is related toComposition.section:sectionSynthesis.text

Group 2 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to Condition (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.problemDescription (A.2.7.1.1 - Problem description)is related toCondition.text
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.problemDetails (A.2.7.1.2 - Problem details)is related toCondition
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.onsetDate (A.2.7.1.3 - Onset date)is equal toCondition.onSetDateTime
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.endDate (A.2.7.1.4 - End date)is equal toCondition.abatementDateTime
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.category (A.2.7.1.5 - Category)is equivalent toCondition.category:poa
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.treatmentClass (A.2.7.1.6 - Treatment class)is equivalent toCondition.category:treated
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.clinicalStatus (A.2.7.1.7 - Clinical status)is equivalent toCondition.clinicalStatus
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.resolution (A.2.7.1.8 - Resolution circumstances)is related toCondition.textThe resolution circumstances may be described as resource or composiiton.section text ; or indirectly determined by the resource (e.g. Procedure) that has been perfomed in reason of this Condition no more active
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.severity (A.2.7.1.9 - Severity)is equivalent toCondition.severity
HospitalStay.diagnosticSummary.stage (A.2.7.1.10 - Stage)is equivalent toCondition.stage

Group 3 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to Device (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.description (A.2.7.3.1 - Device and implant description)is related toDevice.textif referring to the description of the device
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.identifier (A.2.7.3.2 - Device ID)is related toDevice.identifierif generic identifier
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.identifier (A.2.7.3.2 - Device ID)is related toDevice.udiCarrierif it is the udiCarrier

Group 4 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to DeviceUseStatement (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.description (A.2.7.3.1 - Device and implant description)is related toDeviceUseStatement.textif referring to the description of the usage of the device
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.implantDate (A.2.7.3.3 - Implant date)is related toDeviceUseStatement.timing[x]If it refer to the usage period
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.endDate (A.2.7.3.4 - End date)is related toDeviceUseStatement.timingPeriod.end
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.reason (A.2.7.3.5 - Reason)is related toDeviceUseStatement.reasonCode
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.reason (A.2.7.3.5 - Reason)is related toDeviceUseStatement.reasonReference

Group 5 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to Medication (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.productCode (A.2.7.5.2 - Code)is equivalent toMedication.code
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.intendedUse (A.2.7.5.3 - Intended use)is equivalent toComposition.section:sectionMedications
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.productName (A.2.7.5.4 - Brand name)is equivalent toMedication.extension:productName
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.activeIngredient (A.2.7.5.5 - Active ingredient list)is equivalent toMedication.ingredient.item[x]
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.strength (A.2.7.5.6 - Strength)is equivalent toMedication.ingredient.strength
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.doseForm (A.2.7.5.7 - Pharmaceutical dose form)is equivalent toMedication.form

Group 6 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to MedicationDispense (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationDispense.reasonCode
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationDispense.reasonReference
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.productCode (A.2.7.5.2 - Code)is equivalent toMedicationDispense.medicationCodeableConcept

Group 7 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to MedicationRequest (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationRequest.reasonCode
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationRequest.reasonReference
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.productCode (A.2.7.5.2 - Code)is equivalent toMedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConcept

Group 8 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to Procedure (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.procedureCode (A.2.7.2.1 - Procedure code)is equivalent toProcedure.code
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.description (A.2.7.2.2 - Procedure description)is related toProcedure.text
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.bodySite (A.2.7.2.3 - Body site)is related toProcedure.bodySite
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.bodySite (A.2.7.2.3 - Body site)is related toProcedure.extension:bodySiteif details about the body structure have to be provided
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.date (A.2.7.2.4 - Procedure date)is equivalent toProcedure.perfomedDateTime
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.reason (A.2.7.2.5 - Procedure reason)is equivalent toProcedure.reasonCode
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.reason (A.2.7.2.5 - Procedure reason)is equivalent toProcedure.reasonReference
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.outcome (A.2.7.2.6 - Outcome)is equivalent toProcedure.outcome
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.complication (A.2.7.2.7 - Complication)is equivalent toProcedure.complication
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.complication (A.2.7.2.7 - Complication)is equivalent toProcedure.complicationDetail
HospitalStay.significantProcedures.focalDevice (A.2.7.2.8 - Focal device)is equivalent toProcedure.focalDevice
HospitalStay.medicalDevices.implantDate (A.2.7.3.3 - Implant date)is related toProcedure.perfomed[x]if the implantation procedure date is recorded

Group 9 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to Observation Results: laboratory

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.significantResults.date (A.2.7.6.1 - Date)is equivalent toObservation.effective[x]Similar Mapping for other Observation profiles
HospitalStay.significantResults.status (A.2.7.6.2 - Observation status)is equivalent toObservation.statusSimilar Mapping for other Observation profiles
HospitalStay.significantResults.description (A.2.7.6.3 - Result description)is related toObservation.textSimilar Mapping for other Observation profiles
HospitalStay.significantResults.details (A.2.7.6.4 - Observation details)is related toObservationSimilar Mapping for other Observation profiles
HospitalStay.significantResults.result (A.2.7.6.5 - Observation result)is equivalent toObservation.value[x]Similar Mapping for other Observation profiles
HospitalStay.significantResults.result (A.2.7.6.5 - Observation result)is equivalent toObservation.component.value[x]Similar Mapping for other Observation profiles
HospitalStay.significantResults.reporter (A.2.7.6.7 - Reporter)is equivalent toObservation.performerSimilar Mapping for other Observation profiles

Group 10 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to Dosage

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.dosageRegimen (A.2.7.5.8 - Dosage Regimen)is equivalent toDosageMedicationDispense.dosageInstruction or MedicationRequest.dosageInstruction or MedicationStatement.dosage
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.route (A.2.7.5.9 - Route of administration)is equivalent toDosage.route
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.period (A.2.7.5.10 - Period of treatment)is related toDosage.timing.repeat.duration

Group 11 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to MedicationAdministration

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationAdministration.reasonCode
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationAdministration.reasonReference
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.productCode (A.2.7.5.2 - Code)is equivalent toMedicationAdministration.medicationCodeableConcept
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.dosageRegimen (A.2.7.5.8 - Dosage Regimen)is related toMedicationAdministrationseveral elements used
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.route (A.2.7.5.9 - Route of administration)is equivalent toMedicationAdministration.dosage.route
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.period (A.2.7.5.10 - Period of treatment)is equivalent toMedicationAdministration.occurencePeriod

Group 12 Mapping from A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN) to MedicationStatement

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationStatement.reasonReference
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.reason (A.2.7.5.1 - Medication reason)is equivalent toMedicationStatement.reasonCode
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.productCode (A.2.7.5.2 - Code)is equivalent toMedicationStatement.medicationCodeableConcept
HospitalStay.pharmacotherapy.period (A.2.7.5.10 - Period of treatment)is equivalent toMedicationStatement.effectivePeriod
